parameters.match: number of eggs where color matched
parameters.hb.sd: standard deviation of host egg breadths
parameters.cb.sd: standard deviation of cuckoo egg breadths
parameters.cl.sd: standard deviation of cuckoo egg lengths
parameters.cbreadth: mean breadth of cuckoo eggs in given host's nest
parameters.clength: mean length of cuckoo eggs in given host's nest
parameters.hl.sd: standard deviation of host egg lengths
parameters.nomatch: number where color did not match

title: Comparison of cuckoo eggs with host eggs
description:
Description
These data compare mean length, mean breadth, and egg color,
between cuckoos and their hosts.
reference:
Although from the same study that generated data in the data frame
cuckoos, the data do not match precisely.  The cuckoo egg
lengths and breadths are from the tables on page 168, the host egg
lengths and breadths from Appendix IV on page 176, and the color
match counts from the table on page 171.
format: A data frame with 10 observations on the following 12 variables.
